p.k: Professor Philp Brainard is a man so lost in thought that he appears, at times, not to pay attention. He's even forgotten two dates to marry his sweetheart Sara but then this guy's got a lot on his mind. He's working with his high-voltage, over-amorous flying robat assistant, Weebo, on an idea for a substance that's not only a revolutionary new source of energy, but may well be the salvation of his financially troubled medfield college, where his beloved Sara is the president.
